results.question: Does README.md document the --distro CLI flag with usage examples?

evidence.findings: Lines 126-131 contain --distro flag documentation with alpine and ubuntu examples

results.question: Does README.md document the wizard distro selection as the first step?

evidence.findings: Line 113 shows 'Select distribution: Alpine Linux' as first wizard prompt

results.question: Does README.md include instructions for changing distributions on existing VMs?

evidence.findings: Section 7 'Change Distribution' documents workflow with recreation warning and confirmation prompt

results.question: Does CHANGELOG.md have an entry for multi-distribution support under [Unreleased]?

evidence.findings: Complete Multi-Distribution Support entry with 46 role variants documented

results.question: Does README.md list both supported distributions (Alpine and Ubuntu)?

evidence.findings: Lines 9-11 list Alpine Linux (default) and Ubuntu 24.04 LTS with descriptions

results.question: Do all 869 baseline tests still pass after documentation changes?

evidence.findings: 869 passed in 12.52s - all tests pass with zero regressions

results.question: Are all 46 role variants (23 Alpine + 23 Ubuntu) present in the roles directory?

evidence.findings: 23 Alpine variants and 23 Ubuntu variants found (46 total)

results.question: Does the provisioner correctly apply distro suffix to all roles in _ROLES_WITH_VARIANTS?

evidence.findings: _ROLES_WITH_VARIANTS has 23 entries, _apply_distro_suffix correctly applies suffixes, comprehensive test coverage
